# ImpossibleLabs

> A hardware and software studio turning wild ideas into real products. Open source by default.

## About

ImpossibleLabs is a tech studio by OxMarco. We turn absurd ideas into reality, combining hardware and software to build experimental projects. Our philosophy is inspired by M.C. Escher: "Only those who attempt the absurd will achieve the impossible."

## What We Do

- Hardware prototyping and development
- Software engineering and open source contributions
- Experimental tech projects
- Creative technology exploration

## Projects

Our portfolio showcases various experimental projects spanning hardware, software, and creative technology. Each project represents our commitment to pushing boundaries and having fun while doing it.

## Contact

- Website: https://impossiblelabs.xyz
- Author: OxMarco
- GitHub: https://github.com/OxMarco

## Technical Stack

### Languages
C/C++, Typescript, Javascript, Python, Solidity, PHP

### Frameworks and Tools
React, NestJS, NextJS, Flask, Arduino, Foundry, Laravel

## License

Projects are open source unless otherwise specified.
